sen.j: 星川 麻呂（ほしかわ の まろ、生年不明 - 天武天皇9年5月27日 (旧暦)（680年））は、日本の飛鳥時代の人物である。
sen.e: HOSHIKAWA no Maro (date of birth unknown - May 27, 680 in the old calendar) lived during the Asuka period in Japan.
sen.cmt: 西暦表示がなく旧暦年のみであるため、(680 in the old calendar) としました。
sen.e: HOSHIKAWA no Maro (date of birth unknown - May 27, 680 in old lunar calendar) lived during the Asuka period of Japan.
sen.cmt: 用語を統一します。
sen.e: HOSHIKAWA no Maro (date of birth unknown - July 2, 680 in old lunar calendar) lived during the Asuka period of Japan.
sen.cmt: グレゴリオ歴に変更しました。

sen.j: 旧仮名遣いでの読みは「ほしかはのまろ」。
sen.e: The reading of his name in the old Japanese syllabary characters is "HOSHIKAHA no Maro."
According to the old Japanese syllabary characters, it is considered that his name had been pronounced as 'Foshikafa no Maro.'
sen.cmt: 誤訳です。飛鳥時代、は行は「ｆ」音で発音されていたので「foshikafa」となります。オリジナル著者がこの文章を入れたのは発音の違いを示すためです。「旧仮名遣いで」という説明はこの著者以外には使わないと思われますが、正しく訳すと左のようになります。
sen.e: According to the old Japanese syllabary characters, it is considered that his name had been pronounced as 'Foshikafa no Maro.'
sen.cmt: 修正なし

sen.e: Kabane (hereditary title) is Omi.
His kabane (hereditary title) was Omi.
sen.cmt: 時制を直します。
sen.e: His kabane (hereditary title) was Omi.
sen.cmt: 修正なし

sen.j: 672年の壬申の乱で大海人皇子（天武天皇）側についた。
sen.e: He fought on the side of OAMA no Miko (Emperor Tenmu) in the Jinshin War 672.
He fought on the side of Oama no Miko (Prince Oama, later became Emperor Tenmu) in the Jinshin War of 672.
sen.cmt: 用語を統一します。
sen.e: He fought on the side of Oama no Miko (Prince Oama, later became Emperor Tenmu) in the Jinshin War of 672.
sen.cmt: 修正なし

sen.e: Conferred posthumous honours of Daishi.
sen.cmt: 「大紫」が死後贈られた場合の位階(贈位)と解釈しあｍした。[出典] http://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E5%A4%A7%E7%B4%AB
sen.e: He was given posthumously the rank of Daishi.
sen.cmt: スタイルを統一します。訳語選択ミスがあります。
sen.e: He was given posthumously the rank of Daishi.
sen.cmt: 修正なし

sen.j: 星川氏は星川の地に名をとった氏族で、その地は大和国山辺郡星川と推測される。
sen.e: HOSHIKAWA is the clan whose name is taken from the land of Hoshikawa, and it is assumed to be Hoshikawa, Yamabe County, Yamato Province.
The Hoshikawa clan was a family whose name had been taken from a district, Hoshikawa, and the district is assumed to have been Hoshikawa, Yamabe County, Yamato Province.
sen.cmt: 訳語選択ミスがあります。時制を直します。
sen.e: The Hoshikawa clan was a family whose name had been taken from a district, Hoshikawa, and the district is assumed to have been Hoshikawa, Yamabe County, Yamato Province.
sen.cmt: 修正なし

sen.j: 星川麻呂については、『日本書紀』の天武天皇9年5月27日に、小錦中星川臣麻呂が死に、壬申の年の功によって大紫の位を贈られたことが見える。
sen.e: He is described in "Chronicles of Japan" that Shokinchu HOSHIKAWA no Maro died and in recognition of his achievement in the year of Jinshin he was honoured with the rank of Daishi on May 27, 680.
sen.cmt: 西暦対照年は以下の出典に従い680年としました。[出典]【年譜】http://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E5%A4%A9%E6%AD%A6%E5%A4%A9%E7%9A%87#.E5.B9.B4.E8.AD.9C
sen.e: As for HOSHIKAWA no Maro, he is described in the article of May 27, 680 of "Nihonshoki" (Chronicles of Japan) that Shokinchu HOSHIKAWA no Omi Maro died and was given posthumously the rank of Daishi for his achievements in the year of Jinshin.
sen.cmt: 訳漏れがあります。
sen.e: As for HOSHIKAWA no Maro, he is described in the article of July 2, 680 of "Nihonshoki" (Chronicles of Japan) that Shokinchu HOSHIKAWA no Omi Maro died and was given posthumously the rank of Daishi for his achievements in the year of Jinshin.
sen.cmt: グレゴリオ歴に変更しました。

sen.j: 大紫は壬申の功臣の中でも高い位だが、書紀の壬申の乱のくだりに星川麻呂の名は見えないので、どのような活躍をしたかは不明である。
sen.e: Daishi is the highest rank as a meritorious vassal of Jinshin, however there is no description of HOSHIKAWA no Maro in the article of the Jinshin War in Shoki (Chronicles) therefore how well he performed is unknown.

Daishi was a relatively high rank among ranks given meritorious vassals of Jinshin, however there is no description of HOSHIKAWA no Maro in the article of the Jinshin War in Nihonshoki, therefore how well he had performed is unknown.
sen.cmt: 誤訳、時制ミスがあります。
sen.e: Daishi was a relatively high rank among ranks given meritorious vassals of Jinshin, however there is no description of HOSHIKAWA no Maro in the article of the Jinshin War in Nihonshoki, therefore how well he had performed is unknown.
sen.cmt: 修正なし

sen.j: 霊亀2年（716年）4月8日に、子の星川黒麻呂が父の功によって田を与えられた。
sen.e: On April 8, 716, his son, HOSHIKAWA no Kuromaro was granted a rice field in recognition of his father's achievement.
On April 8, 716, his son, HOSHIKAWA no Kuromaro was granted rice fields in recognition of his father's achievement.
sen.cmt: 常識から考えて、「田」を複数形に直します。
sen.e: On May 7, 716, his son, HOSHIKAWA no Kuromaro was granted rice fields in recognition of his father's achievement.
sen.cmt: グレゴリオ歴に変更しました。

sen.j: 天平宝字元年（757年）12月9日に、太政官は星川麻呂の功田4町の扱いを定めるために彼の功績を論じて中功とし、2世に伝えると定めた。
sen.e: On December 9, 757, Daijokan (Grand Council of State) defined HOSHIKAWA no Maro's Kuden (rice fields to those who did meritorious deeds for the state) of approximately 4 hectares, he announced his great achievement and specified as Chuko (3rd level of 4 Kuden inheritance rights levels) which can be passed down for 2 generations i.e. grandchild.
sen.cmt: 単位としての「町」は http://kotobank.jp/word/%E7%94%BA によると「約1ha」とあるので、4町＝約4ヘクタールとしました。律令制における功田の考え方、各区分の定義を簡潔に解説する趣旨で、「4つある相続区分のうちの3つ目で2世(孫)の代まで相続権がある」と言う旨にして英訳。[出典] 参考: http://wpedia.goo.ne.jp/wiki/%E5%8A%9F%E7%94%B0
sen.e: On December 9, 757, Daijokan (Grand Council of State) specified that HOSHIKAWA no Maro had produced the achievements of Chuko (3rd level of 4 level of inheritance rights of Koden) and his Koden (rice fields given to vassals or their families for their achievements) should be inherited by two generations, to define his Koden 4-cho (39672 square meters).
sen.cmt: 誤訳、計算ミスがあります。「一町」は正しくは「一ヘクタール」ではありません。「功田」は通常「こうでん」と読み、「中功」の読みと通じますので「こうでん」とします。
sen.e: On January 26, 758, Daijokan (Grand Council of State) specified that HOSHIKAWA no Maro had produced the achievements of Chuko (3rd level of 4 level of inheritance rights of Koden) and his Koden (rice fields given to vassals or their families for their achievements) should be inherited by two generations, to define his Koden 4-cho (39672 square meters).
sen.cmt: グレゴリオ歴に変更しました。
